excerpt: "Here’s what else you need to know to Get Up to Speed and On with Your Day . A barrage of Russian missile strikes hit grain warehouses across southern Ukraine today, destroying tons of crops. The Ukrainian military said the sustained attacks on the port city of Odesa are part of Moscow’s effort to destroy Ukraine’s ability to export food."
